summary: Provides utilities to construct low‑level XLA custom calls for LAPACK linear‑algebra routines, handling attribute conversion, data‑type prefixes, and shape specifications, and exposing HLO generation for operations such as eigenvalue, Schur, QR, Cholesky, and triangular solves.
business_intent: Enable JAX to leverage high‑performance LAPACK algorithms on the CPU backend by translating JAX‑level linear‑algebra calls into appropriate MLIR/HLO representations that XLA can execute.
